muhammad (sal) thumananta aadaraya karana bawa ha gaurawa karana bawa pawasaman sitina oba sabawatama ethumananta aadaraya karanawa nam, ethumanan gaurawa karanna obe apeksha karanne nam, oba kalayuthu wanne, muhammad (sal) thumanan allah (dewi)ge duthayanan bawa purna lesa wishwasa kirimayi, muhammad (sal) thumanange niyogayan purna washayen piligena haki pamanin eyata awanatha wimayi, muhammad (sal) thumanange wadanwalata erehi nowi eya jiwithaye gena pilipadimayi, muhammad (sal) thumanange mangapenwimwala kisiwak aduwadi nokota ee aakarayen ma pilipadimayi, muhammad (sal) thumanange diwiya thama jiwithaya thula aadarshayak lesa gena pilipadimayi, muhammad (sal) thumananwa thama pranaya, wasthun, mapiyan ha dudaruwanta wada priya kirimayi, muhammad (sal) thumananta haki sama awasthawakama ‘salawath’ kimayi, muhammad (sal) thumanan gena aa shuddha wu kuraanaya haki samawitama parayanaya kirimayi, muhammad (sal) thumanan gena aa dahama igenimata ha awabodha kara ganimata nirantharayen uthsaha kirimayi, muhammad (sal) thumanan penwadun aagamika wathawath nisi lesa ee aakarayatama itukirimayi, muhammad (sal) thumanan awasana wakthruwarayanan bawa piliganimayi, muhammad (sal) thumanan kala mehewara idiriyata lowa thula gena yamata unanduwimayi, muhammad (sal) thumanange igenwimanta ha mangapenwimanta paraspara wu siyalu kriyawangen purna lesa duraswima, ihathin ma sadahan siyalla ho kihipayak nosalaka hara noese nam sulukota salaka ‘api muhammad (sal) thumananta aadaraya karanawa’ yayi pawasamin balb kodiwal adimin thawath sanskruthiyak ikmawayamata ho abhiyoga kirimata katayuthu kirima saba aadaraya dakwimak nowe.
